response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance and worth to me, reflecting over $1,000,000 in personal investment and value. I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a price that reflects its true essence and rarity.

Considering its unparalleled quality and the effort put into it, I propose a price of $950,000. This offer allows you to secure an exceptional piece at a price that is both reasonable and fair, given its market value and historical significance.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions regarding the product. I am here to provide you with all the information you need to make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
